languages.text: {n}Мастер дисциплины громогласно раздает указания, преподобный Адальберт тихо молится, а Инфернус-мастер обводит часовню цепким взглядом, словно выискивая угрозу.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Мастер дисциплины громогласно раздает указания, преподобный Адальберт тихо молится, а Инфернус-мастер обводит часовню цепким взглядом, словно выискивая угрозу. Неподалеку застыла Кибелла, поглощенная кровавыми следами, что тянутся от руин реликвария.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The Master-at-Arms is barking orders, Confessor Adalbert is murmuring a prayer, and the Infernus Master is circling the chapel with a keen eye as if watching for a threat.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Мастер дисциплины громогласно раздает указания, преподобный Адальберт тихо молится, а Инфернус-мастер обводит часовню цепким взглядом, словно выискивая угрозу.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The Master-at-Arms is barking orders, Confessor Adalbert is murmuring a prayer, and the Infernus Master is circling the chapel with a keen eye as if watching for a threat.{/n}

{n}The Master-at-Arms is loudly dispensing instructions, Confessor Adalbert is praying quietly, and the Infernus Master is circling the chapel with a keen eye, as if watching for a threat. Kibellah is standing nearby, absorbed in the bloody footprints that stretch from the ruins of the reliquary.{/n}
{n}The Master-at-Arms is barking orders, Confessor Adalbert is murmuring a prayer, and the Infernus Master is circling the chapel with a keen eye as if watching for a threat.{/n}

{n}The Master-at-Arms is barking orders, Confessor Adalbert mutters in quiet prayer, and the Infernus Master is circling the chapel with a keen eye, as if watching for a threat. Kibellah stands nearby, completely absorbed in the bloody footprints that stretch from the ruins of the reliquary.{/n}
{n}The Master-at-Arms is barking orders, Confessor Adalbert is murmuring a prayer, and the Infernus Master is circling the chapel with a keen eye as if watching for a threat.{/n}
{n}The Master-at-Arms is barking orders, Confessor Adalbert is murmuring a prayer, and the Infernus Master is circling the chapel with a keen eye as if watching for a threat.{/n}
{n}The Master-at-Arms is barking orders, Confessor Adalbert is murmuring a prayer, and the Infernus Master is circling the chapel with a keen eye as if watching for a threat.{/n}
{n}The Master-at-Arms is barking orders, Confessor Adalbert is murmuring a prayer, and the Infernus Master is circling the chapel with a keen eye as if watching for a threat.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Waffenmeisterin bellt Befehle, Konfessor Adalbert murmelt ein Gebet und der Infernus-Meister umkreist die Kapelle, als würde er nach einer Bedrohung suchen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Master-at-Arms is barking orders, Confessor Adalbert is murmuring a prayer, and the Infernus Master is circling the chapel with a keen eye as if watching for a threat.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Waffenmeisterin bellt Befehle, Konfessor Adalbert murmelt ein Gebet und der Infernus-Meister umkreist die Kapelle, als würde er nach einer Bedrohung suchen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La maestra de armas está dando órdenes, el confesor Adalbert murmura una plegaria y el maestro de infernus recorre la capilla mirando en todas las direcciones, como si buscara una amenaza.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Master-at-Arms is barking orders, Confessor Adalbert is murmuring a prayer, and the Infernus Master is circling the chapel with a keen eye as if watching for a threat.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La maestra de armas está dando órdenes, el confesor Adalbert murmura una plegaria y el maestro de infernus recorre la capilla mirando en todas las direcciones, como si buscara una amenaza.{/n}

languages.text: {n}マスター・アット・アームズは大声で命令を出し、聴罪師アダルバートは静かにブツブツと祈り、インフェルヌス・マスターは、まるで脅威を警戒するかのように眼光鋭く礼拝堂の周囲をぐるぐる回っている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Master-at-Arms is barking orders, Confessor Adalbert is murmuring a prayer, and the Infernus Master is circling the chapel with a keen eye as if watching for a threat.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}マスター・アット・アームズは大声で命令を出し、聴罪師アダルバートは静かにブツブツと祈り、インフェルヌス・マスターは、まるで脅威を警戒するかのように眼光鋭く礼拝堂の周囲をぐるぐる回っている。{/n}

languages.text: {n}戒律大师在高声吼着命令，阿达伯特神父静静地祈祷着，而控火大师则以敏锐的目光观察着礼拜堂周围的情况，仿佛在留意一切可能的威胁。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Master-at-Arms is barking orders, Confessor Adalbert is murmuring a prayer, and the Infernus Master is circling the chapel with a keen eye as if watching for a threat.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}戒律大师在高声吼着命令，阿达伯特神父静静地祈祷着，而控火大师则以敏锐的目光观察着礼拜堂周围的情况，仿佛在留意一切可能的威胁。{/n}

languages.text: {n}La capitaine d'armes aboie des ordres, le confesseur Adalbert psalmodie une prière et le maître-infernus fait le tour de la chapelle en scrutant ses moindres recoins, comme s'il guettait une éventuelle menace.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Master-at-Arms is barking orders, Confessor Adalbert is murmuring a prayer, and the Infernus Master is circling the chapel with a keen eye as if watching for a threat.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La capitaine d'armes aboie des ordres, le confesseur Adalbert psalmodie une prière et le maître-infernus fait le tour de la chapelle en scrutant ses moindres recoins, comme s'il guettait une éventuelle menace.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Silahtar emirler yağdırıyor, Günah Çıkarıcı Adalbert bir dua okuyor ve İtfa Üstadı bir tehdit ararmışcasına keskin gözlerle şapelde tur atıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Master-at-Arms is barking orders, Confessor Adalbert is murmuring a prayer, and the Infernus Master is circling the chapel with a keen eye as if watching for a threat.{/n}
